meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>praise</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to praise</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: If you are going <vocabulary>to praise</vocabulary> this guy in front of you, it would have to be for his amazing <reading>hoe</reading>-using (ほ) abilities. Look at him go with that hoe.
